_docs.WHAT: Amazon Lex V2 bot metadata and core settings
_docs.WHY: Defines the bot's identity, session timeout, and service role for AWS permissions
_docs.HOW_TO_USE: Import via AWS CLI: aws lexv2-models create-bot --cli-input-json file://bot-definition.json
_docs.REPLACE: Change ACCOUNT_ID in roleArn to your AWS account number

name: CensusEnumeratorBot
description: Amazon Lex bot for conducting Census Enumerator surveys via voice and chat
